title: Registration Form
description: A clean and responsive user registration system built with modern web technologies. It offers smooth form interactions, structured validations, and efficient data handling for a seamless user experience.

title: Calculator App
description: A simple and intuitive calculator application developed using front-end technologies. It features responsive button controls, accurate calculations, and a polished UI designed for easy daily usage.

title: Sparkit E-Commerce
description: A modern MERN-based e-commerce platform offering smooth navigation, responsive layouts, and intuitive browsing features. It provides users with a reliable and fluid online shopping experience.
